description: Percentage of adults who reported drinking alcohol in the past year
Note: Data collected between January and December

Indicator: Adherence to the Canadian Low-Risk Drinking Guidelines
description: Percentage of adults who drink according to the Canadian Low-Risk Alcohol Drinking Guidelines
Note: Data collected between January and December

Indicator: No Safe Level of Drinking Alcohol During Pregnancy
description: Percentage of adults who believe there's no safe level of alcohol during pregnancy
Note: Data collected between September and December

Indicator: Effect of Cannabis on Memory Loss
description: Percentage of adults who agree that regular cannabis use during adolescence can lead to long-term memory loss

description: Percentage of adults who agree that regular cannabis use during adolescence can lead to difficulty in concentrating
Note: Data collected between September and December

Indicator: Effect of Cannabis on Mental Health
description: Percentage of adults who agree that regular cannabis use during adolescence can cause mental health conditions

description: Percentage of adults who agree that regular cannabis use during adolescence can lead to addiction
Note: Data collected between September and December

Indicator: Effect of Smoking Cannabis on the Lungs
description: Percentage of adults who agree that smoking cannabis can cause lung damage
Note: Data collected between September and December

description: Percentage of adults who agree that using cannabis during pregnancy can lead to health problems for the baby

description: Percentage of adults who agree that using cannabis while breastfeeding can lead to health problems for the baby
Note: Data collected between May and August

description: Percentage of adults who support restrictions on advertising, marketing and sponsorship of cannabis products
Note: Data collected between January and April

Indicator: Support for Sale through Government-Owned Stores
description: Percentage of adults who agree that cannabis products should be sold at government-owned stores
Note: Data collected between January and April

Indicator: Newborn Withdrawal from Opioid Use During Pregnancy
description: Percentage of adults who agree that babies can experience withdrawal symptoms at birth as a result of opioid use during pregnancy

description: Percentage of adults who agree that using opioids during pregnancy can lead to health problems for the baby

description: Percentage of adults who agree that using opioids while breastfeeding can lead to health problems for the baby
Note: Data collected between January and April

Indicator: Risk of Overdosing on Prescription Pain Medication
description: Percentage of adults who identify using pain medication according to a doctor's prescription as high or medium risk for overdosing
Note: Data collected between May and December

Indicator: Risk of Addiction to Prescription Pain Medication
description: Percentage of adults who identify using pain medication according to a doctor's prescription as high or medium risk for becoming addicted
Note: Data collected between May and December

description: Percentage of adults who are exposed to second hand smoke daily or almost daily

description: Percentage of adults who reported smoking tobacco in the past year

description: Percentage of smokers who reported quitting smoking for a day or more in the last year

description: Percentage of smokers who want to quit smoking in the next 6 months

description: Percentage of adults who support a ban on smoking inside multi-unit dwellings

description: Percentage of adults who reported their health as excellent or very good

description: Percentage of adults who reported their mental health as excellent or very good

description: Percentage of adults who have a self-reported body mass index of overweight or obese

description: Percentage of adults who reported they are sedentary for six hours or more daily

description: Percentage of adults who have walked or biked for reasons other than recreation or fitness in the past 12 months

description: Percentage of adults who rate their neighbourhood as very good or excellent place to walk

description: Percentage of adults who reported they suffered a fall in the last year

Indicator: Perception of Family Violence in the Community
description: Percentage of adults who think there is some or a lot of family violence in their community
Note: Data collected between May and August

Indicator: Sense of Belonging to the Local Community
description: Percentage of adults who rate their sense of belonging to the local community as strong or very strong

description: Percentage of children 0 to 12 years exceeding the recommended amount of daily screen time
chartComment: A parent or guardian reported screen time for their children

description: Percentage of adults who think bed bugs have an effect on human health

Indicator: Concern About Bed Bugs in the Home
description: Percentage of adults who are concerned about bed bugs getting into their home

Indicator: Awareness of the Immunization of School Pupils Act
description: Percentage of parents/guardians aware that up-to-date immunizations are required for children attending school in Ontario by law, unless a signed exemption form is provided
Note: Data collected between January and December

Indicator: Awareness of Notifying PHU After Child Receives an Immunization
description: Percentage of parents/guardians who know they must notify their public health unit each time their child receives a required immunization
Note: Data collected between January and December
